---
category: news
title: "Forests with diverse tree sizes and small clearings hinder wildland fire growth"
excerpt: "A new 3-D analysis shows that wildland fires flare up in forests populated by similar-sized trees or checkerboarded by large clearings and slow down where trees are more varied. The research can help fire managers better understand the physics and dynamics of fire to improve fire-behavior forecasts."
publishedDateTime: 2021-01-27T20:07:00Z
